description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSpook:
At the start of battle, this creature gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}. This creature deals 200% more damage while it is {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}. This creature's {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE} buff is no longer removed at the start of its turn.
name: Gateway Incense
